title: Struggling to Survive, ClassPass Moves Workouts Online
description:
Today is Monday, April 13, 2020, and we’re looking at ClassPass vs. independent fitness studios.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
